*These are the answers to [Questions: Area between two curves](../questions/qs-areabetweencurves.qmd).*

**Please attempt the questions before reading these answers!**

1.4. $\quad 2$

1.7. $\quad \dfrac{4}{3}$

1.8. $\quad \dfrac{1}{6}$

1.9. $\quad \dfrac{1}{4}$

1.10. $\quad \dfrac{8}{3}$
